paper_abstract: We compare the efficiency of two prominent techniques for simulation of complex systems: parallel tempering and Wang-Landau sampling. We show that both methods are of comparable efficiency but axe optimized for different platforms. Parallel tempering should be chosen on multi-processor system while Wang-Landau sampling is easier to implement on a single-processor computer.
paper_title: Numerical comparison of Wang-Landau sampling and parallel tempering for met-enkephalin
